code: import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Counter=()=>{const counter=useSelector(state=>state.counter);const dispatch=useDispatch();const incrementHandler=()=>{dispatch({type:'increment'});};const decrementHandler=()=>{dispatch({type:'decrement'});};const toggleCounterHandler=()=>{};const className={counter:'counter',value:'counter__value'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:className.counter,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Redux Counter"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:className.value,children:counter}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:incrementHandler,children:"Increment"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:decrementHandler,children:"Decrement"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleCounterHandler,children:"Toggle Counter"})]});};export default Counter;
